Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_01.Text: *: There's a band o' thugs led by a bloke named Robbin' 'Ood that call this tower 'ome, ya know.
*: Just keep yer wits 'bout ya once ya start gettin' close to the top floor<--->those upper levels are crawlin' with the blighters.
*: Wassat? You gave Robbin' 'Ood an 'idin? Crikey, you must be an 'ardnut an' an 'alf! 'Ow come I've never 'eard of ya?

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_02.Text: *: Skyfell Tower may be swarming with monsters, but one can navigate it with surprising ease if one focuses on each fiend's weaknesses.

*: Some monsters are weak to fire spells such as Frizz and Sizz. There are also those which will not last long when assaulted with wind-enfused incantations like Woosh. In summary, different fiends have different vulnerabilities.
*: Doubtless, <IfSolo(you will,your companions will)> work out what attacks to use against which enemies in due course. <IfSolo(,You simply need apply the right tactics.)>

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_3F_SUB_0_ACTOR_01.Text: *: This place has been home to the world's great bandits for generations. Ahh, just feel the history!

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_3F_SUB_0_VOLUME_0.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_5F_MAIN_0_VOLUME_.Text: *: Oi, you lot! Looks like we got some unwanted guests 'ere!
*: Just what we need! We'd better let the boss know, eh?

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_6F_MAIN_0_VOLUME_.Text: Fair play to ya<--->you done alright makin' it this far.
But if you fink ye're gonna catch me that easy, you got anuvver fing comin'!

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_4F_MAIN_0_VOLUME_.Text: Gah, you don't give up, do ya?
Well, if you want a piece of me, let's go!

Txt_Talk_ShampaneTower_4F_MAIN_0_BATTLE_.Text: Alright, alright! It's a fair cop! I'll give the poxy crown back! Just let me go, will ya?
Cheers ears!
Yer a saint, though! Be lucky, eh? Ta-taaa!
I'll turn me life around! I'll go straight, I promise! Just let me go, pleeease?
*: Would you Adam and Eve it? We're free, Boss!
*: Just need to find somewhere to lay low and we'll be back in the bees and 'oney before ya know it.
It is he! Robbin' 'Ood, the bandito!
*: Fink that's our cue, Boss!
When it bleedin' rains...
*: Mi perdoni... They fled before we could capture them.
I see... Well, at least the crown is in safe hands. Il Re will be most pleased.
Hero of Aliahan. Your help was most vitale in securing the crown. Please, deliver it to our king yourself.
He will want to thank you personally, and I'm sure the outpost will be reopened soon after.
*: But Commendatore, that is not enough<--->
Ah, sì, sì!
How could I forget<--->even once the outpost reopens you will need the chiave magica<--->the magic key.
Were it possible, I would love nothing more than to hand it to you myself as your reward.
It is just, well, I am unsure as to its location, you see...
*: Actually, I have heard it is hidden in the desert to the south<--->within the great pyramid.
Davvero? I suppose that would make sense...
Now, my men and I must return to the castle al più presto. I swear we will repay you someday for this kindness.
The best of luck looking for the key. May the Goddess go with you!
